select distinct ${columnName} from scm_sale_order where 1=1
and ${columnName} like CONCAT(#{columnValue},'%')
and dj_date between to_char(ADD_MONTHS (sysdate, -12),'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_char(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate,0),'YYYY-MM-DD') and rownum <= 500

select distinct ${columnName} from SCM_DELIVERY_DETAIL where 1=1
and ${columnName} like CONCAT(#{columnValue},'%')
and DELIVERY_DATE between ADD_MONTHS (sysdate, -12) and ADD_MONTHS (sysdate, 0) and rownum <= 500

select distinct ${columnName} from SCM_STEEL_SETTLE where 1=1
and ${columnName} like CONCAT(#{columnValue},'%')
and FKDAT between ADD_MONTHS (sysdate, -12) and ADD_MONTHS (sysdate, 0) and rownum <= 500
